summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 27 feet of Lot 4, Block 1, University Home Tracts Addition; Lots 2 to 12 inclusive, Block 1, May Addition; Tract 66 of Kelsey's Brighton Beach Acre Tracts; East 70 feet of Lots 2 and 3, Block 101, Terry's 2nd Addition; Lots 21 to 24 inclusive, Block 62, and Lots 21 and 22, Block 63, Boston Company's Plat; and Lots 7 to 12 inclusive, Block 98, McNaught's Central Seattle Additon, Lot 36, McNaught's Supplemental, and Lots 7 to 12 inclusive, Block 18, Walker's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-175 and 17-125, respectively.
